# Pull Request

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (typo, broken link, formatting)
- [ ] Documentation improvement (clarity, citations)
- [ ] Content correction (factual error with evidence)
- [ ] Small addition (< 100 lines, clearly scoped)
- [ ] Other (describe below)

## Description

**What does this PR do?**

(Brief summary â€” 2-3 sentences)

**Where are the changes?**

(List affected files)

## Rationale

**Why is this change needed?**

(Explain the reasoning)

## Evidence / Sources

**For factual changes**: Provide citations

**For corrections**: Show what was wrong and why your version is correct

## Checklist

### Content Quality
- [ ] Changes are accurate and supported by evidence (if factual)
- [ ] Citations are provided for any claims (if applicable)
- [ ] Markdown formatting is correct
- [ ] Links work and point to appropriate resources
- [ ] Language is clear and follows existing style

### Scope
- [ ] Changes are minimal and focused
- [ ] This fits within documented scope (`/00_MANIFEST/SCOPE.md`)
- [ ] This aligns with principles (`/00_MANIFEST/PRINCIPLES.md`)
- [ ] For large changes: I opened an issue/discussion first

### Review
- [ ] I have reviewed my own changes
- [ ] I have tested any links I added
- [ ] I have checked for typos and grammar
- [ ] I understand this will be reviewed and may be rejected or require changes

## Additional Context

(Any other information reviewers should know)

---

## For Maintainers

### Review Checklist
- [ ] Scope alignment verified
- [ ] Quality standards met
- [ ] Citations checked (if applicable)
- [ ] Formatting correct
- [ ] Links tested
- [ ] No unrelated changes included

### Decision
- [ ] Approve and merge
- [ ] Request changes
- [ ] Convert to proposal (too large/complex)
- [ ] Close (out of scope or quality issues)
